contents.text: Thank you for calling Betterment in New York, the online financial advisor built for people who refuse to settle for average investing.
For account services and support, press '1'.
To open a new account and get started, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our account opening team.

navigationGoals: I want to open a new Betterment investment account.
As a veteran, I want to create a new Betterment account and fund it.
Open a new Roth IRA and configure automated ACH deposits via Plaid
I want help setting up a new Betterment account and walking through the process.
I’d like to open a new Betterment account to start investing my savings for graduate studies.

contents.text: For questions about your existing account or technical support, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with an account support specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help resolving an issue with my existing account.
I need assistance accessing my existing account to review my veteran benefit deposits.
Resolve a two-factor authentication failure on my existing account login
I need assistance resetting my account password.
I need assistance troubleshooting why my recent deposit isn’t showing up in my Betterment account.

contents.text: For personalized investment advice and portfolio guidance, press '2'.
To schedule a one-on-one portfolio review with an advisor, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a portfolio advisor.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a one-on-one portfolio review with an advisor.
As a veteran, I want to schedule a one-on-one portfolio review with an advisor.
Schedule a one-on-one portfolio review to discuss asset allocation and tax-loss harvesting
I’d like to schedule a one-on-one phone review of my portfolio with an advisor.
I want to schedule a one-on-one portfolio review to discuss optimizing my asset allocation.

contents.text: For information on our automated investing solutions, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our automated investing experts.

navigationGoals: I’m seeking detailed information on your automated investing solutions.
I’d like to learn about automated investing solutions for my post-service savings.
Get specifications on Betterment’s automated investing algorithms and tax optimization features
I want information about Betterment’s automated investment plans and how they work.
I’d like to learn more about Betterment’s automated investing solution and how it manages portfolios.
